projects.title: Kayak Clone
projects.bodyText:
- Team project for Enterprise Distributed Systems 
 - This is a 3-tier application that implements the functions of Kayak for different travel services containing user and admin modules
 - Admin can add Flights, Cars and Hotels and also be able to delete the user and view the statistics.

projects.title: Tesla Homepage
projects.bodyText:
- Replicated Teslaâ€™s minimalist, clean, and sleek aesthetic using a carefully chosen color palette and typography.
 -  Focus on user-centered design, with a strong emphasis on ease of navigation and visual clarity.
 - Used media queries to create a fully adaptive, responsive design for various screen sizes.

projects.title: Pizza Shop
projects.bodyText:
- Allows users to add pizzas to the cart with options for modifying quantities and calculating totals.
 - Uses Redux Toolkit for managing the cart's state, ensuring smooth interactions across the application.
 - Tailwind CSS is used to create a clean, responsive layout that adjusts seamlessly across devices.

projects.title: Aladdin 2D Game
projects.bodyText:
- Developed Aladdin 2D game using greenfoot 
 - Aladdin follows a heroic journey where Aladdin overcomes enemies, retrieves a magic carpet, frees Genie from a flask, and conquers obstacles to reunite with Princess Jasmine.
